=== Plans to Participate in the GSoC ===

I'm also planning to participate in the GSoC, as a mentee of Dustin Kirkland for Testdrive Front-end. 

My application is being prepared here: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/GSoC/2010/AndresRodriguez

=== Cluster Stack ===

During last UDS (UDS-L), I co-held a session with Anter Karamatic related to the cluster stack. While Ante worked on getting the packages ready for failover, I worked in Load Balancing. My work is detailed in the blueprint, and as follows:

* '''Blueprint:''' <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/server-lucid-cluster-stack|Cluster Stack Blueprint - [andreserl]]</nowiki>]
* '''Configuration/Testing/Documentation:''' 
1. Configure Load Balancers using two different technologies. First, used keepalived. Second, use Pacemaker/ldirectord which is part of the new cluster stack. 
2. Test Packages/Configurations in the search for packaging bugs/software bugs and ask for Community member participation to perform testing.
3. Documentation on configuring Load Balancers to be included as part of the Cluster Stack Configuration as well as the Ubuntu Server Guide. <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ClusterStack/LucidTesting#Load Balancing|Document can be found here so far]]</nowiki>
